PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CommunicationsApplianceTypeIpNetworkEquipment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to a IP network equipment. This property set is applied to a type or occurrence of _IfcCommunicationsAppliance_ with predefined type of IP_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT.

PropertyDef.Name: EquipmentCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the equipment capacity of the appliance. The value is defined in bits/s.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCoolingFans
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of cooling fans in the equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: SupportedProtocol
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the protocol supported by the IP network equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: ManagingSoftware
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of software responsible for managing the equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.
